fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
* Definition of criteria for the identification of Endocrine Disrupting Chemicals, European Strategy on EDC  
 
* Implementation of EU Nature Legislation 
 
* EU Fisheries Policy
relevant_communication: The Effectiveness of EU Nature Legislation: A Long Battle to Secure Supporting Sectoral Policies, in The Effectiveness of Environmental Law; Intersentia 2017.
customers: The Pew Charitable Trusts# Tara Foundation# The Endocrine Society
goals__remit: Provide legal, policy and strategic advise in relation to the elaboration and implementation of EU environmental law and policy, with a view to improve environmental and health protection.
